price: Por certo, Allah defende os que crêem. Por certo, Allah não ama a nenhum traidor, ingrato.
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدَٰفِعُ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ خَوَّانٖ كَفُورٍ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yudāfiʿu ʿani alladhīna āmanū inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu kulla khawwānin kafūrin
